9.1.3.1.title: Web server
9.1.3.1.text: This component provides functionalities that deliver web content to web browsers. In addition to the web server platform, it also refers to services required to support web applications.

9.1.3.2.title: Proxy server
9.1.3.2.text: This component routes web traffic and acts as a load balancer and a reverse proxy server to contribute to secure connections to the web server.
